headline: As Libya Faces a Growing Conflict, Turkey Deploys Troops to Back Its Government
abstract: Turkish forces would deploy for a year to bolster the government in Tripoli and allow a return to the political process.
lead_paragraph: ISTANBUL â€” Turkey has started deploying troops to Libya, President Recep Tayyip Erdogan said Sunday evening in a live television interview, keeping his promise to support the fragile government in Tripoli even as Western states have warned against escalating a conflict between the government and rebel forces.
